Articles.Content: How do I upload my spacecraft to the workshop on steam?

I'm afraid I don't know, but I have moved your question to a spot where someone who does is likely to see it.

Welcome to the forum.
Moved to the Kerbal Network, as this isn't about the game specifically.

When making a craft in the VAB/SPH you will see the buttons that say launch/save etc

One of those will have the steam logo click it and the UI will tell you what to do

if the button isn't there then either its a bug or you can't because you don't own the game on steam
